## Variables

### LongBranchFactor {#a0cc6e6349acbe2be32cbf40e3a49b433}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>cl::opt&lt; double &gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;GCNPreRALongBranchReg.cpp&#125;::LongBranchFactor(&quot;amdgpu-long-branch-factor&quot;, cl::init(1.0), cl::Hidden, cl::desc(&quot;Factor to apply to what qualifies as a long branch &quot; &quot;to reserve a pair of scalar registers. If this value &quot; &quot;is 0 the long branch registers are never reserved. As this &quot; &quot;value grows the greater chance the branch distance will fall &quot; &quot;within the threshold and the registers will be marked to be &quot; &quot;reserved. We lean towards always reserving a register for  &quot; &quot;long jumps&quot;))</>}
